description: Bold Red wines are known for their robust flavors and high tannin content.
Medium Red wines balance fruit, tannins, and acidity, offering versatility.
Light Red wines are fresh and light, perfect for a summer day.
Rosé wines are crisp and refreshing, often with a hint of sweetness.
Rich White wines are full-bodied with complex flavors and aromatic richness.
Light White wines are known for their acidity and crisp, refreshing taste.
Sparkling wines are vibrant and bubbly, often with a touch of sweetness.
Sweet White wines are delightful, with pronounced sweetness and aromatic bouquets.
Dessert wines are rich and sweet, often enjoyed with or as dessert.
